title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Planetary Health and Sustainable Future Citizen Leadership Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of environmental science and public health, digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze at least three cases explaining the connection between planetary health and local environmental issues.
Learners can simulate the impact of climate change on local communities using VR simulations and propose response strategies.
Learners can establish action plans to evaluate human-ecosystem interactions by applying the 'One Health' framework.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
